metadata.title: CVE-2017-12871 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The aesEncrypt method in lib/SimpleSAML/Utils/Crypto.php in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.x through 1.14.11 makes it easier for context-dependent attackers to bypass the encryption protection mechanism by leveraging use of the first 16 bytes of the secret key as the initialization vector (IV).

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
